recipes.author: 68d10d0a66aebf194ecf97d7

recipes.title: Signature Mother’s Day Mimosa Recipe
recipes.description:
There’s something about a mimosa that just says celebration—but this isn’t your typical orange juice and bubbly. This Signature Mimosa brings a citrusy twist with limeade or lemonade and a gentle fizz that wakes up your palate (and your brunch table).

Whether you're raising a glass to Mom, hosting Sunday brunch, or just treating yourself to something bright and refreshing, this sparkling mimosa is the perfect sip.

And thanks to the Drinkmate line of sparkling water makers , it couldn’t be easier to add those perfect, tiny bubbles. Unlike traditional soda makers, the Drinkmate lets you carbonate more than just water—juice, cocktails, mocktails, and yes, even wine blends.

Why You’ll Love This Sparkling Mimosa
No flat mixers – Say goodbye to lackluster brunch drinks.
Custom fizz level – You control the sparkle.
Eco-friendly and cost-saving – Skip the store-bought bottles and cut down on waste.
Endlessly customizable – Try it with grapefruit juice, pineapple, or sparkling mocktail versions!
And if you’re looking to impress, that sugar rim + citrus garnish combo gives this drink real main character energy.

Brighten Your Brunch
There’s no wrong time for a mimosa, but this one feels extra perfect for Mother's Day, spring brunches, bridal showers, or even a solo Saturday on the patio.

So grab your Drinkmate, grab your ingredients, and get ready to sparkle something beautiful.

Cheers to brighter mornings and better bubbles. 🧡

instructions.instruction: Pour all ingredients into your Drinkmate OmniFizz to carbonate.
Rim glass with sugar (get the rim wet first so it sticks!)
Pour into glass without touching the rim.
Garnish with a tangerine slice.

recipes.author: 68d10d0a66aebf194ecf97d7

recipes.title: Red, White, & Blue Mocktail Recipe
recipes.description:
Sometimes you want a fun drink that doesn’t need alcohol to shine—and this bold, tropical mocktail is exactly what your next hangout needs. It’s bright, refreshing, and takes just seconds to make with your Drinkmate OmniFizz, the only carbonation system that lets you sparkle any drink.

That’s right. Not just water.
Not just juice.
Anything.

This mocktail blends the tangy zip of Cran-Apple, the cool blue of your favorite electrolyte drink, and a tropical swirl of Piña Colada—all carbonated to fizzy perfection. It’s a hit at parties, family BBQs, or just as a pick-me-up on a weekday afternoon.

Want to level it up? Try swapping in frozen juice cubes instead of ice, or serve it with a citrus garnish for an extra pop of color.

Sparkle Smarter

No single-use bottles. No sugary sodas. Just you, your ingredients, and a Drinkmate soda maker ready to fizz up some fun.

Go on. Sparkle anything.

instructions.instruction: Fill your Drinkmate with the Cran-Apple, Blue Gatorade, and Pina Colada juice.
Add sparkle!
Pour into a glass over ice and enjoy!

recipes.author: 68d10d0a66aebf194ecf97d7

recipes.title: Homemade Orange Soda Recipe
recipes.description:
Looking for something clean, uplifting, and just a little unexpected? Meet your new go-to: this Homemade Orange Soda. With just three natural ingredients—fresh orange juice, raw honey, and water—you’ve got a better-for-you beverage that’s lightly sweet, citrusy, and sparkling with life. And the magic? It’s all in the Drinkmate OmniFizz. 

While other soda makers are limited to water only, Drinkmate lets you fizz up anything—including fresh juice blends like this one.

Why You'll Love This Drink
All-natural ingredients – No artificial flavors or added sugar
Soothing and refreshing – A little honey, a lot of citrusy goodness
Perfect for mornings or wind-down evenings
Kid-friendly, brunch-ready, and endlessly customizable
Want a zesty twist? Add a squeeze of lemon. Craving extra chill? Serve over ice with a sprig of mint. Or just keep it classic—three ingredients and all the sparkle you need.

Make Every Sip Better
With the Drinkmate soda maker, the possibilities go way beyond sparkling water. From homemade sodas to mocktails and wellness drinks, you’re in control of the fizz—and the fun.

So go ahead. Pour it in, sparkle it up, and toast to something simple and seriously refreshing.

Sparkle anything. Love everything.

instructions.instruction: Add all ingredients to Drinkmate & carbonate!

recipes.author: 68d10d0a66aebf194ecf97d7

ingredients.name: Lime Juice, plus rind from 1 Lime

instructions.instruction: 1. In a small pot on medium heat dissolve sugar in water. Raise the heat, add the lime rind and bring to a boil.
Lower the heat to a simmer and cook until slightly reduced. Remove from heat and discard the lime rinds. Stir in the food coloring and cool, add ice.
2. Next Pour into your drinkmate machine to carbonate. Pour into glass and garnish with lime slice.
Combine all liquid ingredients before carbonating.
Add to Drinkmate bottle; up to the Max Fill line or below.
Shake bottle to mix ingredients before carbonating. Push button or pull trigger to carbonate.
Shake gently again for 5 seconds. Let stand 5 seconds, then release pressure, adjusting speed as needed to avoid foam reaching the top.
Pour into ice filled glass if desired.

Pour into ice filled glass if desired.

recipes.title: Strawberry mint cocktail
recipes.description: Strawberry Mint Cocktail is a refreshing and delicious drink that combines the flavors of ripe strawberries and fresh mint to create the perfect balance of sweetness and aroma. This cocktail typically includes crushed strawberries, mint leaves, a touch of simple syrup for sweetness, and a little citrus juice such as lemon or lime. Mix these ingredients with ice and then strain into a chilled glass. Garnished with a sprig of mint and fresh strawberries, this cocktail is not only a treat for the senses but also a beautiful and aromatic visual experience as well, making it a popular choice for those looking for a fruity and herbaceous drink to enjoy on warm days or during social gatherings.

instructions.instruction: Crush the ice cubes with a blender and pour them into a cup
Add the strawberries with some mint leaves to the blender and grind them with half a cup of carbonated water until the ingredients are well mixed.
Add the mixture to the cup of ice
We fill the rest of the cup with carbonated water and decorate it with lemon slices and mint leaves

recipes.author: 68d10d0a66aebf194ecf97d7

recipes.title: Mojito with mint
recipes.description: Mint Mojito is a refreshing drink perfect for summer times. It features a wonderful blend of lemon juice and fresh mint, which gives it a citrusy and refreshing flavour. Lemon is mixed with simple sugar, mint leaves, and lime fruits to add sweetness and depth to the drink. The mint mojito is served with crushed ice to give it the perfect chill. This drink is perfect for those looking for a refreshing taste experience on hot summer days. Flavors can be further customized by adding fruits like strawberries or raspberries to add an extra fruity touch. The Mint Mojito is the perfect embodiment of simplicity and freshness in the world of summer drinks.

instructions.instruction: Mix water, fresh lemon juice, mint leaves and sugar in a blender.
Filter the mixture into a bowl, then add it to the Drinkmate bottle. To make a soft drink.
Pour the fizzy mixture into a glass decorated with ice and lemon slices.

Strain off the raspberry water and carbonate - it’s incredibly delicious!

instructions.instruction: Peppermint leaves, strained in 2 cups water
1/4 cup stevia or similar sweetener
1 tablespoon of lime extract
Add water to Drinkmate bottle to about 5 oz below the fill line

In a small pot on medium heat dissolve sugar in water. Raise the heat, add the lime rind and bring to a boil. Lower the heat to a simmer and cook until slightly reduced. Remove from heat and discard the lime rinds. Stir in the food coloring and cool, add ice.
Next Pour into your drinkmate machine to carbonate. Pour into glass and garnish with lime slice.
